tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE battery_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  battery_serial_number VARCHAR(50),
  voltage DECIMAL(5,2),
  current DECIMAL(5,2),
  temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
  charge_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Battery_Performance_Metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    charging_time INTERVAL,
    discharging_time INTERVAL,
    charging_efficiency DECIMAL,
    cycle_count INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE BatteryMetrics (
  battery_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  brand VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  capacity INTEGER NOT NULL,
  charging_time INTEGER,
  discharge_rate INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE BatteryHealth (
  health_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  battery_id INTEGER REFERENCES BatteryMetrics(battery_id),
  health_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  cycles_completed INTEGER,
  temperature INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE BatteryHistory (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  battery_id INTEGER REFERENCES BatteryMetrics(battery_id),
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  charging_cycles INTEGER,
  discharging_cycles INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE charge_cycles (
    cycle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    kWh_charged DECIMAL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_battery_id FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE battery_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    error_message TEXT,
    error_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_battery_id FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE battery_metrics (
    battery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    voltage DECIMAL(5,2),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE charging_history (
    charging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    start_time DATETIME,
    end_time DATETIME,
    charging_duration INT,
    charging_power DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    date DATE,
    distance_covered DECIMAL(8,2),
    efficiency DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE health_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    technician VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES battery_metrics(battery_id)
);
